name: swide
short_description:
swide is a IDE with a design independent of the development technology used with it, fully extensible and cross platforming in mind , for creating any type of software (desktop applications, web applications, mobile applications, gui applications, etc), providing all the modern features found in many free and commercial  IDEs, like syntax highlighting, code completion, class browsing and full featured debugging, with programming languages like Python,  Java, C/C++, x86 Assembly, PHP and others.

All of this will be implemented in external packages or plugins. These plugins will be writen in a interpreted language, separated from the core IDE. The core IDE will be writen in C/C++ for achieving good performance, fast response times and low resource usage, utilizing the Qt4 framework for easing cross platform support.
